metadata.Title: CVE-2022-28656 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - low.
metadata.Description:
is_closing_session() allows users to consume RAM in the Apport process

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-28656` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

apport - 2.21.0-0ubuntu1
apport-gtk - 2.21.0-0ubuntu1
apport-kde - 2.21.0-0ubuntu1
apport-noui - 2.21.0-0ubuntu1
apport-retrace - 2.21.0-0ubuntu1
apport-valgrind - 2.21.0-0ubuntu1
dh-apport - 2.21.0-0ubuntu1
python3-apport - 2.21.0-0ubuntu1
python3-problem-report - 2.21.0-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: apport package in lunar was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.21.0-0ubuntu1').
